DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation neck strengthen program potential intervention reduce risk sport-related concussion youth contact collision sport athlete .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Neck Strengthening Program Reduce Risk Sport-related Concussion
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study investigate effect supervise 8 week strengthen intervention male female youth contact collision sport athlete . Participants complete supervise strengthen exercise intervention involve manual resistance exercise administer strength coach pre- post-intervention assessment neck size strength .
DOC.criteria: Contact/collision sport athlete ( example , american football , soccer , rugby , lacrosse , ice hockey , field hockey , basketball , wrestling , boxing , martial art , water polo ) History concussion ( suspect diagnose ) previous 6 month History neck pain injury previous 6 month History migraine headache History personal parental history diagnose anxiety disorder
